Name: condition
Description: Stimulus condition: inverted, object, uprightInv, uprightObj in the Faces task.

Name: condition
Description: Stimulus condition: standard, deviant, predeviant in the MMN task.

Name: Latency_<time-window>_<ROI>
Description: Latency to peak/adaptive mean amplitude within specified time window (in ms) at the specified region of interest. Values are averaged across trials for each condition.

Name: ntrials
Description: Number of trials per condition retained after processing.

Name: MeanAmp_<time-window>_<ROI>
Description: Mean amplitude within specified time window (in ms) at the specified region of interest. Values are averaged across trials for each condition.

Name: Peak_<time-window>_<ROI>
Description: Peak/adpative mean amplitude within specified time window (in ms) at the specified region of interest. Values are averaged across trials for each condition.

Name: SME_<time-window>_<ROI>
Description: Standardized measurement error within specified time window (in ms) at the specified region of interest. Values are averaged across trials for each condition.

Name: Latency_<time-window>_<ROI>
Description: Latency to peak/adaptive mean amplitude within specified time window (in ms) at the specified region of interest. Values are provided for each trial.

Name: MeanAmplitude_<time-window>_<ROI>
Description: Mean amplitude within specified time window (in ms) at the specified region of interest. Values are provided for each trial.

Name: condition
Description: Stimulus condition: VEP has only one condition.

Name: id
Description: Subject ID

Name: condition
Description: Stimulus condition: standard, deviant, predeviant in the MMN task.

Name: Peak_<time-window>_<ROI>
Description: Peak/adpative mean amplitude within specified time window (in ms) at the specified region of interest. Values are provided for each trial.

Name: trial_num
Description: Trial number

Name: spectra_output_electrode
Description: Electrode label

Name: spectra_output_1.0Hz
Description: Sum of absolute power centered at 1 Hz (within the 0.5hz to 1.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site

Name: spectra_output_2.0Hz
Description: Sum of absolute power centered at 2 Hz (within the 1.5hz to 2.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site

Name: spectra_output_3.0Hz
Description: Sum of absolute power centered at 3 Hz (within the 2.5hz to 3.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site

Name: spectra_output_electrode
Description: Electrode label

Name: spectra_output_1.0Hz
Description: Sum of natural log power centered at 1 Hz (within the 0.5hz to 1.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site

Name: spectra_output_2.0Hz
Description: Sum of natural log power centered at 2 Hz (within the 1.5hz to 2.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site

Name: spectra_output_3.0Hz
Description: Sum of natural log power centered at 3 Hz (within the 2.5hz to 3.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site

Name: spectra_output_electrode
Description: Electrode label

Name: spectra_output_1.0Hz
Description: Sum of power in db centered at 1 Hz (within the 0.5hz to 1.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site

Name: spectra_output_2.0Hz
Description: Sum of power in db centered at 2 Hz (within the 1.5hz to 2.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site

Name: spectra_output_3.0Hz
Description: Sum of power in db centered at 3 Hz (within the 2.5hz to 3.5hz freq range) at corresponding electrode site
